itunes:title: Episode 772 - The Richard Marx Saga
title: Episode 772 - The Richard Marx Saga
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway break down Ross’s Twitter feud with famous musician Richard Marx in which Ross accused Marx of trying get a BJ from his aunt in the 80s, Ross and Dan address their listeners who were mad at them for ripping Ted Cruz for fl...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway break down Ross’s Twitter feud with famous musician Richard Marx in which Ross accused Marx of trying get a BJ from his aunt in the 80s, Ross and Dan address their listeners who were mad at them for ripping Ted Cruz for flying to Cancun during the Texas Freeze, and there’s some light Juggalo talk — plus Dan explains why the U.S. will never get out of the Middle East.
